Regency
hide bio
PM . Follow . Favorite
Joined 06-01-02, id: 222521, Profile Updated: 11-14-17
Author has written 280 stories for JAG, Stargate: SG-1, Pretender, Charmed, West Wing, StarTrek: The Next Generation, CSI, Passions, Alias, Battlestar Galactica: 2003, General Hospital, Princess Diaries, Harry Potter, Law and Order: SVU, House, M.D., Sarah Jane Adventures, 24, CSI: Miami, James Bond, Criminal Minds, NCIS, Psych, White Collar, Sanctuary, Rizzoli & Isles, Twilight, Doctor Who, Sherlock, StarTrek: Voyager, Bold and the Beautiful, Once Upon a Time, Tudors, Kingsman: The Secret Service, Lewis, Bridget Jones' Diary, Holby City, Supergirl, and Grey's Anatomy.

ETA: 11.09.2015 My old computer ate the last year and half of fic (and non-fic writing) I've written, which included a lot of progress previously listed below and I cannot get it back. Thus, the future of my oldest stories is even more up in the air than ever. I'm sorry. Thank you for reading and I appreciate your support.

Hey, I'm, well, her up there, twenty-seven going on fifty. I love to write, especially things I've never written before. With few exceptions, I'll try any fandom once. If I like it, I'll keep coming back. (Profile avatar made on WeaveSilk.)

My writing can also be found either at Archive of Our Own (under Regency). I have a Tumblr as well, under sententiousandbellicose. Welcome to my profile.

As a warning, I'd like to remind everyone that I've been posting here for over a decade and that the quality of my writing has varied a lot over that time. Please, take that into account when reading and deciding to comment. I'm glad for all feedback, but I'm being perfectly honest when I say that I know a lot of it is terrible or cheesy or over the top. I know. It just doesn't feel right to take it down. At least it makes all the recent stuff look better by comparison...hopefully. There are a number of fics I'd like to overhaul altogether, but I don't know when and if I'll have the chance.

  • My Stories 280
  • Favorite Stories 500
  • Favorite Authors 59

You Bought It, You Fix It
AU. When Serena and Robbie were buying a house together, they agreed to appear on a home improvement reality TV show on a lark.
